https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qL0IooP0bjXy0KXl9KEyPo22ll0.jpg As an epidemic of a lethal airborne virus - that kills within days - rapidly grows, the worldwide medical community races to find a cure and control the panic that spreads faster than the virus itself. Contagion
